subject: AI & Agents
title: Speech-to-Text: Turning Audio into Words
description: A quick win: understand Speech-to-Text: Turning Audio into Words.

hook.text: Speak into your phone and text appears. That's automatic speech recognition (ASR).

buildup.text: ASR models convert audio waveforms into text transcriptions.

discovery.text: Whisper by OpenAI handles 99 languages, accents, background noise, and even punctuation.

twist.text: ASR struggles with homophones ('there' vs 'their'), mumbling, and domain jargon.

climax.text: Fine-tune on your domain's audio (call centers, medical, legal) for dramatically better results.

quiz.question: What does Whisper by OpenAI do?
options: Converts audio into text across 99 languages
